11#ifndef MODULES_AUDIO_CODING_CODECS_ISAC_MAIN_SOURCE_OS_SPECIFIC_INLINE_H_
12#define MODULES_AUDIO_CODING_CODECS_ISAC_MAIN_SOURCE_OS_SPECIFIC_INLINE_H_
13
14#include <math.h>
15
16#include "rtc_base/system/arch.h"
17
18#if defined(WEBRTC_POSIX)
19#define WebRtcIsac_lrint lrint
20#elif (defined(WEBRTC_ARCH_X86) && defined(WIN32))
21static __inline long int WebRtcIsac_lrint(double x_dbl) {
22 long int x_int;
23
24 __asm {
25 fld x_dbl
26 fistp x_int
27 }
28 ;
29
30 return x_int;
31}
32#else // Do a slow but correct implementation of lrint
33
34static __inline long int WebRtcIsac_lrint(double x_dbl) {
35 long int x_int;
36 x_int = (long int)floor(x_dbl + 0.499999999999);
37 return x_int;
38}
39
40#endif
41
42#endif // MODULES_AUDIO_CODING_CODECS_ISAC_MAIN_SOURCE_OS_SPECIFIC_INLINE_H_
43
